import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Card, CardBody } from "reactstrap"; const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id, title, city, reviews, photo, price, featured, averageRating} = tour return (
Featured
{city} {averageRating} ({reviews.length})
{title}
${price} /per person
Book Now
); }; export default TourCard;
